name: FriendBeat.com
overview:
Our company believes that real friendships can happen when people can reach each other, and have opportunity to interact on daily basis therefore Friendbeat.com is the place where you introduce yourself to local people only. No disappointments that perfect friend is found and there is no way to meet.

Friendbeat.com gives everyone live opportunities to meet real, genuine people to make friends with. Our guests can communicate and answer messages free. The website provides an opportunity to get to know local people and form meaningful, lasting friendships. Users get presented with a chance to fill up those free hours with the people they’ve met and have a great time.

Our users are given the opportunity to talk to new people. They have a very real possibility of making a friend for life. Friendbeat.com actually encourages communication and gives users the tools to do so. Just look around and see for yourself. You can see thousands of amazing people who live, work, and study around. And you wish you could be friends at least half of them. Your life may change significantly!
